de.hdu.zimmerbelegung.ctrl
Class VerwaltungCtrl

java.lang.Object
  de.hdu.zimmerbelegung.ctrl.VerwaltungCtrl

public class VerwaltungCtrl
extends java.lang.Object

Controller for "verwaltung.zul" which is the main application view. This class manages the whole process of selecting the timespan (datumVon, datumBis), the room (Zimmer) and the guest (Gast) to place a booking (Buchung) or reservation (Reservierung)

Author:
Stefan Feilmeier, Roland KÃ¼hnel, Franz Wagner
